2053.subject: KOR
2053.descrlong: Alternative assessment for the third semester of Korean. Freshmen and sophomore transfers attempting to satisfy the Language ULR through assessment must enroll in KOR 101, 102, 201, and 202 concurrently, except for international students who may enroll only in KOR 202. Junior and senior transfers attempting to satisfy the Language ULR through assessment, must enroll in KOR 101, 102, and 201, except for international students who may enroll only in KOR 201 or 202.
